snippet: A former aide to former Prime Minister Petr Necas who later married him was found guilty of abuse of power on Monday in a scandal that exposed their affair and toppled the government a year ago.
abstract: Jana Necasova, former aid to Czech Prime Min Petr Necas who later married him, is found guilty of abuse of power in scandal that exposed their affair and toppled government in 2013.
lead_paragraph: A former aide to former Prime Minister Petr Necas who later married him was found guilty of abuse of power on Monday in a scandal that exposed their affair and toppled the government a year ago.
